Name: Abundant
Description: At the start of your turn, draw 2 Colossus cards instead of 1.
Goal: Discard your played Divine Gifts here. Once you have played 4, gain 10 gold and discard this card.

Name: Aggressive
Description: When you kill an opponent's Acolyte, gain 1 Gold.
Goal: If you kill 5 Acolytes in a single turn, gain an extra 5 gold and discard this card.

Name: Alchemist
Description: On your turn you may discard your Colossus cards, Traits, or Acolytes in play.
Goal: When doing this, discard them here. You may not use them until this goal is fulfilled.Once you have done this 10 times, Gain 10 gold.

Name: Beast master
Description: You may pay 1 Gold to move a Beast 1 space in any direction.
Goal: If there are 2 Beasts in play, and you control both of their spaces at the end of any age, gain 10 gold and discard this card.

Name: Diasporic
Description: On your turn, you have 6 actions. You cannot play cards.
Goal: At the end of your turn, if each of your Acolytes is on a different space adjacent to water, gain 7 gold and discard this trait.

Name: Domineering
Description: When your Colossus moves into a space containing Beasts or other Colossi, you may move them 1 space in any direction.
Goal: When doing this, place 1 gold cube here. When you have done this 5 times, gain 5 gold and discard this trait.

Name: Extortionist
Description: When an opponent takes control of a space away from you, they lose 1 gold.
Goal: When doing this, place 1 gold cube here. When you have done this 5 times, gain 5 gold and discard this trait.

Name: Gilded
Description: Every time you Harvest Gold Loot, gain 1 additional Gold.
Goal: If you Harvest every available Gold Loot tile at the end of an age, gain 8 Gold and discard this trait.

Name: Monolithic
Description: You may only Reap 1 space at the end of each Age. However, you also Reap the Loot and Gold cubes from the spaces adjacent to it, even if you do not control them.
Goal: After doing this once, discard this trait.

Name: Necromancer
Description: Any time an opponent's Acolyte dies, you may replace it with an Acolyte from your hand.
Goal: Keep their Acolyte here (it is no longer in their hand). Once you have done this 4 times, gain 8 gold, return opponents' Acolytes to their hand, and discard this trait.

Name: Nomadic
Description: At the end of your turns, you may Reap up to two spaces you control. Do not Reap any tiles at the end each Age.
Goal: Place 1 gold cube here when doing this. When you have done this 4 times, gain 4 gold and discard this trait.

Name: Parasitic
Description: When an opponent plays a card, you may take it in exchange for discarding a card from your hand.
Goal: When doing this, tuck your discarded card here. When you have tucked 5 cards, gain 5 gold and discard this trait.

Name: Resurrecting
Description: When one of your Acolytes dies, you may move it to your Colossus's space instead of back to your hand.
Goal: When doing this, place 1 gold cube here. When you have done this 5 times, gain 5 gold and discard this trait.

Name: Soothsayer
Description: At the start of your turn, you may either look at the top 3 Environment tiles, or the top 3 Colossus Cards. Put them back in any order you choose.
Goal: When doing this, place 1 gold cube here. When you have done this 5 times, gain 5 gold and discard this trait.

Name: Tactical
Description: On your turn, playing Colossus cards does not cost you any actions.
Goal: Tuck your played cards here under this trait. Once you have tucked 10 cards, gain 10 gold, and discard this trait.

Name: Winged
Description: When moving your Colossus, you may move it to any space.
Goal: When doing this, place 1 gold cube here. When you have done this 5 times, gain 5 gold and discard this trait.

Name: Zoophilic
Description: When spawning Acolytes, you may spawn them on or adjacent to any Beast's space.
Goal: At the end of an Age, if all of your Acolytes in play are on Beast spaces, gain 7 gold and discard this trait.
